properties.name: dataset-manager.url
properties.description: Sets the url to communicate with the dataset.

properties.name: dataset-manager.user
properties.description: Sets the user to authenticate on the dataset.

properties.name: dataset-manager.password
properties.description: Sets the password to authenticate on the dataset.

properties.name: security.secret
properties.description: Sets the secret to use for JWT validation. Default: 'abc123.'.
